text: Guarea thompsonii, also called black guarea or dark bossé, is a species of plant in the family Meliaceae. It is found in Cameroon, the Republic of the Congo, the Democratic Republic of the Congo, Ivory Coast, Gabon, Ghana, Liberia, and Nigeria. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== thompsonii Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Flora of Cameroon Category:Flora of the Republic of the Congo Category:Flora of the Democratic Republic of the Congo Category:Flora of Gabon Category:Flora of Ivory Coast Category:Flora of Ghana Category:Flora of Liberia Category:Flora of Nigeria Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Guarea thompsonii
